title: Patch Update Really Slow
body:
Leagues been doing the occasional patch update but it's been a few hours now and it's only on 33%,
"Calculating Differences 8575 Files Scanned" and still going.
Is this happening to anybody else?

replies.body:
i've been downloading it for 2.5 hours so far, my internet is going fast but the download is only at 30kbps for some reason.... really fking anoying ive tried so many things to fix but nothing has worked.

Did you find a solution?
